basics.name: Nguyen Van Hao
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: A curisous and hard-working person who is passionate about data and technology. I am looking for a position where I can apply my knowledge and skills to solve real-world problems.

work.name: Breathtaking Vietnam Agency
work.summary: Like CEO of a small company, I am responsible for the overall performance of the project, including the quality of work, the profitability of the project, and the satisfaction of clients and teammate.
highlights: Find and build relationships with new clients who are marketing leaders at their companies or SME owners
Present proposals to clients and negotiate contracts
Act as a bridge between clients and agency to ensure the smooth flow of information and communication, ensure the quality of work and meet deadlines

work.name: One Mount Distribution
work.summary: A program for young talents who are passionate about sales and want inovate the traditional distribution model.
highlights: Research on site and analyze the market, customers to enhance the effectiveness of sales
Present ideas to BOD and implement the project
Distribute FMCG products to an area of more than 100 grocery stores

work.name: Anima Vietnam
work.summary: Provide uniforms and workwear for companies, factories and schools.
highlights: Find and build relationships with customers
Consult materials, designs and prices for customers
Negotiate contracts and ensure the quality of work and meet deadlines
Send orders to the factory and follow up the production process
Ensure timely delivery and payment from customers

certificates.title: Digital Literacy Certification - IC3 Certification
certificates.summary: A global benchmark for basic computer literacy, including operating systems, hardware, software (almost Mircosoft Offices), and networks.
